Bi-Weekly Solo Platform Update August 20, 2021
Hello,
We're writing to inform you that our next bi-weekly development will be released to test environments on September 17, 2021 and to production environments on September 21, 2021.
The Solo Platform Release Notes aligned to this release can be accessed here (https://intouchhealth.com/software-release-notes/) (password: SWRN2020). New features will be enabled automatically in all Client Acceptance Test environments only.
View Release Notes (https://intouchhealth.com/software-release-notes/?utm_campaign=biweekly-release-notes&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=button) Password: SWRN2020
Clients may request these feature enhancements be enabled (toggle enabled) in their production environment at any time by contacting our Technical Assistance Center at TAC@TeladocHealth.com.
Key Updates:
Desktop App The next release for the Desktop Provider and Patient App will be posted for client acceptance testing on September 9, 2021 and released to production on October 7, 2021. Key features include the ability to blur the background for a video session and an improved user experience related to thumbnail layout and session control. This release can only be installed on Windows 10 and macOS. Additional details were included in the September 2, 2021 bi-weekly release notes.
Connected Devices Release The new release of Windows devices software, Provider Access, iOS Provider Access and iOS Viewpoint will begin rolling out the week of September 27, 2021. Additional details were included in the September 2, 2021 bi-weekly release notes.
Q4 Browser Support Policy As part of our ongoing quarterly release process, Teladoc Health reviews and revises the list of supported browsers and versions. Updates to the support list can be found in the September 2, 2021 bi-weekly release notes and will be enforced in U.S. production environments on October 19, 2021.
Sincerely, Teladoc Health Product Management
